Html:
Hello,

need help pls ....

I can not find the directory "C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\90\Samples" for the reporting services samples as stated in the help.

I installed (AdventureWorksDB.msi) & attached the adventure works db.
In addition to that I ran the AdventureWorksBI.msi, which added the Analysis BI solution in the directory C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\90\Tools\Samples\AdventureWorks Analysis Services Project\, but not the reporting services samples.

Any idea where to find the reporting services samples?

thks,
iulmer

I'v got the same problem . I installed VS 2005 Professional Edition , and then i installed Microsoft SQL Server 2005 Standard Edition . While installing , samples & books online are completely finished . But I only found Tutorials .
I can't find the folder "Samples" in "C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\90\"
In C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\90 " ,
1. COM
2. DTS
3. EULA
4.NotificationServices
5.SDK
6.Setup Bootstrap
7.Shared
8.Tools
Moreover , in "C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\90\Tools ", there is no "SAMPLE" folder .
There are
1.Bin
2.Binn
3.Books
4.Profiler
5.Reporting Services
6.Templates
folders .
After I installed AdverntureWorks.msi ,
"AdventureWorksData.mdf " & "AdventureWorksLog.ldf" are stored in C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL.1\MSSQL\Data

Not in samples ....
I wanna know where is the SAMPLE folder .

thanks in advance
khine
You can find reporting services samples here. You can find all the samples on our portal page at http://CodePlex.com/SqlServerSamples.
